CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 18, 1958, pg. 1, reads: "He Was Hunting Leaves - Shot by Eccentric - Joseph McGrady, 15, of 313 Fourth Ave., Aliquippa, lies in an Aliquippa Hospital bed before undergoing surgery to remove a bullet lodged near his spine.  Police say Orlando Colonna, 37, or Seventh Ave., Aliquippa, fired a rifle at young McGrady and three other youths Monday, while they were hunting autumn leaves on a hillside. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Joseph McGrady lying in bed at Aliquippa Hospital after being shot by Orlando Colonna
